G15Purple Documentation

Author:
Kabili < kabili207@gmail.com
Version:
0.6

DESCRIPTION

A plugin which interfaces the Logitech GamePanel LCD with Pidgin. These LCDs are currently found in the G15 Keyboards and G13 Gamepads.

The pidgin-libnotify plugin was used as a base for the interface with libpurple. pidgin-libnotify is available at http://gaim-libnotify.sourceforge.net/
